content: {A心虚目移}Mmph, well... it doesn't have to be perfect... Um, you know... maybe it's enough... as long as it works. Please, could you teach me?
info: 伊佐奇家装-伊佐奇_主流程文本II

content: The Daikabutomaru statue I made was so unrecognizable that he flipped it over!
info: 伊佐奇家装-伊佐奇_主流程文本II

content: Any <style=Highlight>potted plant</style> will do. If it's chosen by you, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, it's bound to be tasty — n-no, I mean pretty, mm-hmm.
info: 伊佐奇家装-伊佐奇_主流程文本II

content: {A两眼放光}Mhm mhm, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, I saw it all... <style=SizeBig>Your amazing decorating skills!</style>
info: 伊佐奇家装-伊佐奇_主流程文本II

content: {A看我的}Once I lay eyes on your perrrrfect furniture masterpiece, I'll figure it out for sure! I will, indeed!
info: 伊佐奇家装-伊佐奇_主流程文本II

content: {A愤怒}The table I made collapsed the moment I put a bowl on it. That pot I crafted? Split open right when I planted something! And...
info: 伊佐奇家装-伊佐奇_主流程文本II

content: I've got the <style=Highlight>Inspo Card: Golden Daikabutomaru Statue</style> all ready. So, without further ado, please accept it — indeed.
info: 伊佐奇家装-伊佐奇_主流程文本II

content: <style=SizeBig>Teach me, teach me, teach meeee!</style> I want to build a perfectly perfect home too!
info: 伊佐奇家装-伊佐奇_主流程文本II

content: How about I make some sample pieces for you?
info: 伊佐奇家装-伊佐奇_主流程文本II

content: {A灵光一现}You'd really do this for me, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>? <style=SizeBig>Thank you soooo much!</style>
info: 伊佐奇家装-伊佐奇_主流程文本II

content: I've got the <style=Highlight>Inspo Card: Golden Daikabutomaru Statue</style> all ready. And the <style=Highlight>mattock</style> for gathering materials as well. Please accept them — indeed.
info: 伊佐奇家装-伊佐奇_主流程文本II

content: <style=NpcName>Glenn</style> says they're selling a <style=Highlight>Glowspire Round Table</style>. It looks super sturdy, should be able to handle all the bowls without collapsing.
info: 伊佐奇家装-伊佐奇_伊佐奇
